definition: Han, one of the Seven Hero States of the Warring States 戰國七雄|战国七雄/Korea from the fall of the Joseon dynasty in 1897/Korea, esp. South Korea 大韓民國|大韩民国/surname Han

sentences.english: Russia says that Iran and North Korea do not have missiles capable of striking Europe.
sentences.chinese: 俄羅斯說，伊朗和北韓沒有掌握可以打擊歐洲的導彈。

sentences.english: Yongbyon is approximately 60 miles [96 kilometers] north of the capital at Pyongyang.
sentences.chinese: 寧邊位於北韓首都平壤以北約96公里處。

sentences.english: Rajin-Sonbong (or Rason, for short) lies by the Sea of Japan in the country’s north-east, near the border with Russia.
sentences.chinese: 羅津靠近日本海，在北韓的東北部，接近俄國邊界。

sentences.english: A North Korean soldier stared at them from just a few centimeters away, through a window.
sentences.chinese: 一名北韓軍人在幾公分外的窗口另一側注視着他們。

sentences.english: Over the years, North Korea has made many attacks near the island.
sentences.chinese: 多年以來，北韓多次向延坪島附近發動襲擊。

sentences.english: Eagleburger says the U. S. can try to persuade the North Koreans to come back to the negotiating table.
sentences.chinese: 伊格爾伯格說，美國有能力試圖說服北韓重返談判桌。

sentences.english: On May 26, North Korea test-fired two more missiles.
So we're confident that the North Koreans do, in fact, have a program to enrich uranium to produce nuclear weapons.
sentences.chinese: 因此，我們確知北韓有製造核武器的濃縮鈾項目。

sentences.english: It has also destroyed the cooling tower at its reactor at Yongbyon.
sentences.chinese: 北韓還炸燬了寧邊核反應堆的冷卻塔。

sentences.english: Most of the North Koreans we spoke with said they were fleeing poverty and food shortages.
sentences.chinese: 大多數北韓人都說他們在逃離貧困和食物短缺。

sentences.english: North Korea has needed aid to feed its people for more than decade.
sentences.chinese: 十多年來，北韓一直需要糧食援助來讓其國民有飯喫。

sentences.english: How close was the North Korean-Syrian cooperation?
sentences.chinese: 敘利亞和北韓的合作密切到什麼程度？

sentences.english: North Korea has for years relied on its nuclear build-up to squeeze aid from its neighbors and the United States.
sentences.chinese: 北韓多年來靠本國的核武庫向鄰國及美國榨取援助。

sentences.english: Both North Korea and Iran have been working to develop nuclear capabilities.
sentences.chinese: 北韓與伊朗都一直在努力發展核能力。

sentences.english: They say they expect North Korea to conduct the launch during daylight hours.
sentences.chinese: 他們說，預計北韓在白天進行這次發射。

sentences.english: Late 2005, the nuclear standoff in North Korea is coming to a boil.
sentences.chinese: 直至2005，看似平和的核危機將於北韓再度升溫。

definition: North Korea/Korea as geographic term/Taiwan pr. [Chao2 xian1]
THAAD (Terminal High Altitude Area Defense), US Army anti-ballistic missile system
to test-fire/to conduct a missile test
